name: cheatz
description: a small js library to hide easter eggs on your website.
author: Vincenzo Ciaccio <vincenzo.ciaccio@gmail.com>

scripts.build:cjs: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && head -n -1 src/Cheatz.js > dist/cheatz.js && head -n -1 src/Keyecho.js > dist/keyecho.js
scripts.build:dev: rm -rf test/module/*.js && rm -rf test/cjs/*.js && cp src/*.js test/module && npm run build:cjs && cp dist/*.js test/cjs/
scripts.deploy:example: npm run build dev && surge test/module/ --domain cheatz.surge.sh
